== ''Minecraft Legends'' ==
{{For|the full list of piglins and their hordes|MCL: Piglin}}
=== Mobs ===

* [[MCL:Horde of the Bastion|Horde of the Bastion]], a horde of piglins that likes fortifying their outposts with many walls, thus having the most fortified outposts compared to the other two hordes. 
**{{LeEntityLink|Portal Guard}}, Horde of the Bastion-exclusive piglins which have a flail arm which they use to attack.
**{{LeEntityLink|Brute}}, elite piglins that wield two jagged blades that are used to deal damage.
* [[MCL:Horde of the Spore|Horde of the Spore]], a horde of piglins that is less fortified than the Horde of the Bastion at their outposts as they rarely use walls, but they station their outposts on the high ground.
** {{LeEntityLink|Lava Launcher}}, ranged, mounted and massive hoglins that have a magma loaded spring-cannon.
** {{LeEntityLink|Sporeback}}, elite ranged piglin units that throw explosive mushrooms from their back.
* [[MCL:Horde of the Hunt|Horde of the Hunt]], a horde of piglins that doesn't use any fortification in their outposts at all, but their outposts are larger than the others nonetheless. This horde has and uses a lot of bones for their outposts.
**{{LeEntityLink|Pigmadillo}}, large, elite piglin units that bowl through their enemies.
**{{LeEntityLink|Warboar}}, hoglins used by the piglins to attack enemies.
*[[MCL:Runt|Runt]], small piglins that make up the bulk of the piglins' forces in all their hordes.
** {{LeEntityLink|Mace Runt}}, runts that that wields maces.
** {{LeEntityLink|Blaze Runt}}, runts that wields blaze rods.
** {{LeEntityLink|Spore Medic}}, runts that spreads netherspores which heal wounded piglins.
** {{LeEntityLink|Piglin Builder}}, runts that put together piglin structures, and throw bombs.
* {{LegendsEntityLink|Seeker}}, a piglin within the Horde of the Spore and Horde of the Hunt that carries an explosive mushroom.
* {{LegendsEntityLink|Clanger}}, a high-level piglin unit that wields two cymbals.
* Bosses, the leaders of the hordes.
** {{LeEntityLink|The Great Hog}},
** {{LeEntityLink|The Unbreakable}},
** {{LeEntityLink|The Devourer}},
** {{LeEntityLink|The Beast}},
* Piglins that only appear in cutscenes
** {{LeEntityLink|The Seer}},
** {{LeEntityLink|Ancient Hoglin}},
** {{LeEntityLink|Injured piglin}},
** {{LeEntityLink|Messenger Piglin}}
